Hesperia Community Schools Receives Bronze Medal!
Congratulations to Hesperia Community Schools for earning the 2017 U.S. News and World Report Bronze Medal for Best High Schools. Schools are ranked based on their performance on state required tests and how well they prepare students for college and careers.
